title: A Heart of Blood and Magic
description: I'm lost in the fae realm of Underhill, on the run from the Black Queen. Alice never had to fear for her life, but I do. The only one I can trust is falling apart and we're never making it out alive. Can romance really be in my future in this topsy-turvy world?Takes place after book one and at the same time as book two.
author: Jessica Ash
